website_summaries.verdict: An exquisite-looking final resting place with lovely blue finish and timeless, classic design.
pros: Nice looking metal urn with rich blue lacquered finish
Features a lid that screws tightly for secure closure
Owners praise it for its beauty, and some say it looks even better in person
cons: Exterior finish could chip if not handled with care

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this urn for my father who passed away 3 weeks ago, my family and I are very pleased on the quality of this urn. We love the color and it was my father's favorite color. So, I hope that my review will help someone in making a choice.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Even better in person
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful urn and well made. It's even better looking in person versus the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn used for my brother who was an average sized adult...ashes fit. I would buy again. It was delivered a day earlier than promised and there was adequate packaging no damage at all...came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Prai

customer_reviews.title: Just wanted to say thank you for such an amazing urn. It looks even more beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to say thank you for such an amazing urn. It looks even more beautiful in person. ;) the top screws on w no problem and there is plenty of space inside of the urn.
customer_reviews.author: mojo john john

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my father who passed away unexpectedly. I wasn't sure if I could trust getting one from amazon, but I really couldn't find one that fit my dad's personality but this one was exactly what I was looking for. My dad had a guitar when I was little that had this exact design on it. Quality turned out well. and really helped me find some comfort. Price was great too, funerals can be expensive so this really helped out!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that thus would feel cheap but it's absolutely beautifully made. Highly recommend for your loved one. My dad looks good in Blue, still!
customer_reviews.author: STACEY SPENCER

customer_reviews.title: Memorials 4U seems to care that I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something simple. I love the color. I personalized it with an engraved pocket watch rather than any other name tag, and everyone who's seen it so far loves it. I can't comment on the durability since I've just received it, but looks like it will last just fine. Top screws on securely.
customer_reviews.author: Renita K. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Dad likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Packaged well. shipped quick. My father has not complained.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: If you're concerned with the coloring being off because other ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're concerned with the coloring being off because other reviews I can assure you you get what is pictured. It must have something to do with these reviewers lighting because mine looks as pictured, now I'm sure in true lighting the blue may appear brighter just with any color.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieGirl

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. I bought the Forest Blue (looks like water) adult and matching mini urn. They are aluminum, made in India, have screw on tops, and look nice. Both were packaged nicely in tissue, plastic, foam and cardboard. The mini urn seemed smaller than I imagined but is the 3 inches tall specified and it comes in a folding hasp locked box that cradles the mini urn. I had an issue with Amazon delivery vs billing address and Memorials4u customer service responded the next day as well as following up after delivery. Looks as good as the $800 urns the crematorium wanted to sell me.
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful price I got it to put the remainder of my fathers ashes as he wanted them spread but I was keeping some it’s very large but wasn’t sure the smaller urn would be enough. Very satisfied, very sturdy n my father would have loved it cause he liked blue tyvm
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pricing for a quality product that I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I needed an Affordable but quality Urn for my fathers ashes. The funeral homes and other similar places were demanding astronomical prices for their Urns. Memorials 4U came through with a beautiful piece for the solemn resting place for him at a very reasonable price. The piece arrived from shipping in only a few days and it looks awesome. I appreciate this company for selling these at an affordable price during a rough period in our lives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Final resting place.
customer_reviews.text: Our dad loved the water. I was shocked on how gorgeous this urn was. It was like looking at the water. The darkness in it gave the feeling it was in the deep of the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Udel

customer_reviews.title: Color is more turquoise
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful urn but the color is more turquoise than blue even though the pictures are showing blue, which is why I bought it based on blue pictures. It's turquoise. I needed blue like photos so was disappointed at the big difference is all. Not sending back, just don't match my police blue scene.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J.

customer_reviews.title: It's just as beautiful in person.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my choice; my only concern was the "Chemical smell" of the draw string bag included in the shipment, and therefore I gave only four stars for presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Shwacky

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Classical
customer_reviews.text: It has a deep blue on black background pattern; very pretty. Good construction/not overly heavy. Hey, it's an urn. As far as durability goes, I have to give it 5 stars but I won't ever know for sure, now will I? ;)
customer_reviews.author: IcingIsMyCrayon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: A great urn for my love. It arrived sooner than expected, very beautiful and has the same quality or better than the one 6 times the price at the funeral home. It was very well packaged to avoid damage during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: LATORIA WREN-FLONO

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cobalt blue color
customer_reviews.text: My mom's final resting place. Pretty cobalt blue color, and a steal compared to what the funeral homes nail you for..
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: From the picture it looks like a simple urn. The color variations were amazing. This will be a bookcase centerpiece, as it is so artful and delicate. VERY well made, and the lid seals securely. Velvet pouch is a nice touch. Arrived quicker than expected, and was well package. Excellent value for the money!

customer_reviews.title: pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and sturdy. Mouth is just a little small, so if you plan on leaving ashes in the plastic bag, you have to work a little getting it into the jar. but I did it.

However it was needed and will do until I can financially afford what my son deserves.

product_meta.title: MEMORIALS 4U Memorials4u Forest Blue Cremation Urn for Human Ashes - Adult Funeral Urn Handcrafted - Affordable Urn for Ashes - Large Urn Deal
product_meta.description:
Size:Adult

 Memorials4u’s Classic Forest Blue is elegant and affordable CREMATION URN . The urn is made from solid metal and the perfect lacquer coat to preserve its brilliance. It comes with top opening with a threaded lid and felt bottom. The Forest Blue pattern are uniquely finished by hand for each urn to show beautiful detail giving the FUNERAL URN a unique look to each finished product. Our urns are handcrafted uniquely by an ancient process called sand casting. This ADULT URN holds up to 210 cubic inch of cremains and approximate measure is that 1-pound weight prior to cremation equals 1 cubic inch after cremation . Dimensions: 10-inch-high x 8-inch diameter. All of our urns are in our warehouse and ready to ship as soon as payment is cleared. Usually we ship within one business day of receipt of payment. 

 100% Satisfaction Guarantee 

♦SATISFACTION→ We carry elegant and high quality products and we trust that you will be very happy with the quality and creative design of our products 

♦BEST PRICE GUARANTEE

♦EASY RETURN→ If you do not like the product after arrival please contact us by contact form and report the issue within 3 days after product arrival and we will refund your money after product is shipped back to us. But, once product is used we will not accept return due to the personal nature of this product
feature_bullets: This CREMATION URN is a True Hand-crafted product ensuring each urn is UNIQUE, AFFORDABLE URN and DURABLE
This ADULT URN comes with top opening with a threaded lid and felt bottom
FUNERAL URN fits the remains of most adults weighing up to 200 lbs.
Color: Forest Blue, Dimensions: 8"L x 8"W x 11"H. Capacity 200 cubic inches
We have a unique selection of other Metal and BRASS CREMATION URNS in our store MEMORIALS4U
